message_handler module

class message_handler.MessageHandler(game: Game)[source]

Bases: object

Parameters:

  • (Game) (game) – The game instance.

  • (float) (sleep_time) – The sleep time between sending messages.

  • (dict) (last_bullet_update_result) – The result of the last adding operation.

  • (dict) – The result of the last bullet update operation.

  • (set) (bullets_to_delete) – A set of bullet IDs to delete.

  • (int) (delete_bullets_treshold) – The threshold value to trigger bullet deletion.

async handle_bullets_update_message(connected_players, message)[source]

Handle a bullets update message.

Parameters:

  • connected_players – A dictionary mapping websockets to player IDs.

  • message – The bullets update message.

async handle_join_message(websocket, player_id, message: dict, index)[source]

Handle a join message.

Parameters:

  • websocket – The websocket the message is received from.

  • player_id – The ID of the player.

  • (dict) (message) – The join message.

  • index – The index of the player in the connection.

  • (dict) (message) – The move message.

async send_collision_message(websocket, message)[source]

Send a collision message to the specified websocket.

Parameters:

  • websocket – The websocket to send the message to.

  • message – The collision message.

  • message – The error message.

async send_init_connection_message(websocket, id)[source]

Send an initialization connection message to the specified websocket.

Parameters:

  • websocket – The websocket to send the message to.

  • id – The client ID.
